Module kivakit.microservice
Package com.telenav.kivakit.microservice.internal.protocols.rest.plugins.jetty.filter

Class MountedApi

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.broadcasters.Multicaster
com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.repeaters.BaseRepeater
com.telenav.kivakit.component.BaseComponent
com.telenav.kivakit.microservice.internal.protocols.rest.plugins.jetty.filter.BaseMounted
com.telenav.kivakit.microservice.internal.protocols.rest.plugins.jetty.filter.MountedApi
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.telenav.kivakit.component.Component, com.telenav.kivakit.core.language.trait.TryCatchTrait, com.telenav.kivakit.core.language.trait.TryTrait, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Broadcaster, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Listener, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.MessageTransceiver, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Repeater, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Transceiver, com.telenav.kivakit.core.registry.RegistryTrait, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.messaging.Receiver, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.messaging.Transmitter, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.Nameable, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.NamedObject, Restful, RestProblemReportingTrait
public class MountedApi extends BaseMounted implements com.telenav.kivakit.core.language.trait.TryTrait
A JAR file mounted on a path. The JAR will be run in a child process on the specified port. Requests will be forwarded by handleRequest(HttpMethod, JettyRestRequestCycle) to the child process.

WARNING

This API has not been tested and is currently unstable.

Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
